name: Penrose Finance
description: Penrose is a yield aggregator for Dystopia Exchange, a deep-liquidity stablecoin AMM on the Polygon network. Users of Dystopia can provide liquidity on Penrose to earn boosted Dystopia rewards, as well as rewards in the form of the $PEN token, vote for further boosting of their LP, lock DYST tokens for a shorter amount of time as well as receive bribes from projects wanting to boost their liquidity. Penrose is to Dystopia what Convex is to Curve, all built on the Polygon chain.
